name: Automate Interview Scheduling and Data Cleanup with Cal.com and Google Sheets
description:
***Workflow Description***
Automate your candidate interview pipeline with precision.
This powerful integration pulls booking data from Cal.com, extracts interview details (name, email, date & time), and syncs them directly into your Google Sheets tracker. It matches applicants using email, formats the date in the Asia/Riyadh timezone, and appends only relevant entries.

But it doesn‚Äôt stop there ‚Äî it cleans your sheet automatically by removing unmatched or empty records, ensuring your data stays clean, reliable, and ready for HR decisions.

 What it does:
 Fetches interview bookings from Cal.com

 Converts time to readable format (e.g. 30 June, 09:00 AM)

 Matches booking emails with existing applicant records

 Auto-updates interview date in your sheet

 Detects and deletes irrelevant or blank entries

 **Use Cases:**
Resume screening workflows that require automated interview sync

HR dashboards needing real-time calendar updates

Applicant pipelines where only valid interviews should remain

**Ideal for:**
Recruiters ‚Ä¢ HR teams ‚Ä¢ Automation architects ‚Ä¢ Remote hiring pipelines

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

parameters.content:
## üìÖ Cal.com Calendar Setup
This section fetches all bookings from your Cal.com event.

- Pulls booking data via Cal.com API
- Extracts attendee name, email, and interview time

üîê Be sure to insert your Cal.com API Key.

## üîÅ Link to Resume Screening Template
This workflow can be connected to the resume evaluation system.

- Automatically assigns interview schedules
- Matches bookings to existing applicants in your sheet

üìå Useful for aligning candidate records with scheduled interviews.

## üßπ Data Cleanup Logic
This section ensures only valid candidates remain in the sheet.

- Compares booking emails with accepted applicants
- Deletes rows with missing or unmatched data (e.g. no summary)

‚úÖ Keeps your applicant tracking clean and relevant.
